detail_desc: Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with long sleeves, a round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and smocking at the waist.

Dress in soft cotton jersey with a sewn-in bodysuit. Dress with short raglan sleeves, buttons at the back and a skirt in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Press-studs at the crotch. The cotton content of the dress is partly organic.
Boots in waterproof imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, padded edge and hook and loop fastening at the front, Pile linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Bootees knitted in soft organic cotton with embroidery and appliqués at the top and a foldover shaft in jersey. Jersey lining and soft soles.

Calf-length, oversized dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Long, wide sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a seam at the hips with pleats at the front. Unlined.
Hole-knit espadrilles with a braided trim around the soles, fabric insoles and fluted soles.
Top in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.

Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a reversible sequin motif on the front, part of which is glow-in-the-dark.
Dressing gown in soft, textured pile with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Dressing gown in soft, textured pile with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Fitted, knee-length dress in lace with a small stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back, cap sleeves and an inset lace trim at the waist. Lined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in lace with a small stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back, cap sleeves and an inset lace trim at the waist. Lined.

Knee-length dressing gown in soft pile with a hood, pockets, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Knee-length dressing gown in soft pile with a hood, pockets, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings. Top in soft pile with embroidered text on the front, dropped shoulders, jersey ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a rounded hem. Leggings in soft, patterned jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in soft cotton flannel. Shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and long, cuffed sleeves. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in soft cotton flannel. Shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and long, cuffed sleeves. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Pyjama bottoms in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with a gathered, elasticated drawstring waist and straight legs.
Pyjama bottoms in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with a gathered, elasticated drawstring waist and straight legs.

Long-sleeved nightshirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in soft cotton flannel. Shirt with a rounded collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and wide, straight legs.

Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in soft cotton flannel. Shirt with a rounded collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Shorts in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, fly with a concealed zip, and short, wide legs.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.
Scarf in a patterned silk and Tencel™ lyocell weave.
Tailored trousers in a sturdy textured weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce with broderie anglaise at the top, and an elasticated seam under the bust.
Ballet pumps in imitation patent leather with a bow at the front and hook and loop tab over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Calf-length dress in a knit containing some wool with a V-neck, gently dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Calf-length dress in a knit containing some wool with a V-neck, gently dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Short jersey top with a V-neck, short sleeves, decorative buttons and a tie detail at the front and an elasticated hem.
Short jersey top with a V-neck, short sleeves, decorative buttons and a tie detail at the front and an elasticated hem.
Thin metal Alice band with cat ears decorated with sparkly stones.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Set with a dress and polo-neck top in cotton jersey. Printed sleeveless dress with a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Long-sleeved top with a polo neck.
Short jacket in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and concealed front pockets. Jersey lining.
Short jacket in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and concealed front pockets. Jersey lining.
LIMITED EDITION. Satin hairband with a decorative double bow at the front and covered elastic at the back. The bow is decorated with sequins.
Alice band covered with patterned fabric with a large, decorative bow at the top.
Alice band covered with patterned fabric with a large, decorative bow at the top.
LIMITED EDITION. Hairband in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a large bow at the front and elastic at the back.
Wide-fitting top in sweatshirt fabric with a deep cut-out section at the back, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a regular, smocked waist and an extra flounced layer. Unlined.
Ballet pumps in shimmering imitation leather with a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles.

Boxy jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a high polo-neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.

Cardigan in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and no buttons.
